title: Tricolore Salad
summary: Tricolore Salad is a gluten free, primal, and fodmap friendly side dish. For 25 cents per serving, this recipe covers 2% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 15 servings with 28 calories, 1g of protein, and 2g of fat each. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. If you have arugula, balsamic vinegar, belgian endive, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 4 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 28%. This score is not so spectacular. Try Tricolore Salad, Tricolore Salad Recipe, and Tricolore couscous salad for similar recipes.
